Uses of Class
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download.DownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions

  • Packages that use DownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions 
    Package Description
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download
    Contains utilities for downloading bitmaps and binding them to ImageView or any widget which can display a Bitmap.

    • Uses of DownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download

      Subclasses of DownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DownloadInstructions.AbstractInstructions
      An implementation of the DownloadInstructions.Instructions, which returns the bitmapUid as an URL, and which does not present any temporary nor local bitmap.
